name: Retro Three Kingdoms (English)
description:
▶ Official start  - 9th, June 2021 (Greenwich time - 18 00)

12th, June 2021 (Greenwich Mean time(GMT) - 18:00)

Due to a sudden game update anomaly, we postpone the opening by 3 days.

I'm really sorry to those who have been waiting.

▶ Maintenance time - 5 : 00 ~ 8 : 00 every Wednesday

1.  Low Spec MMORPG + MOBA

OSCPUVGARAMWindows XP or higherDual Core
No requirements
2Gb
  •  Disk Space - 2Gb

2. Endless War (Three countries)

3. 1000 on 1000 Siege war (Red Cliff war, Guandu War, MOBA, etc...)

  • MMORPGs cannot do massive sieges warfare unless there is a collision check between players.
  • Large-scale siege warfare is held every week with accurate collision check determination between characters, and collect 5% ~ 20% and reward the winners of the siege to induce  competition.

4.  Blood Brother contents

     ▶ You can summon your blood bro(players) anytime.

5. Soul Mate and Close Friend

  • Players can get 4% RTK-point that Soul Mate consumed RTK-point
  • Players can get 1% RTK-point that Close Friends consumed RTK-point

6. Guidance

  • You can view all content in-game. Try pressing the G key.
